caption.p: Operational stability of OPEr nanobiocatalysts in nine consecutive 24 h transesterification cycles of cooking oil wastes and methanol. (a) SiMAG-octyl-OPEr; (b) AMNP-GA-OPEr; (c) AG1-CH-OPEr; (d) AMNP-CH-OPEr; (e) AG1-GA-OPEr; (f) mCLEAs-OPEr. The reactions were developed at 25 °C, with a rotational stirring (100 rpm), an oil:methanol ratio of 1:4, and 100 mg of each nanobiocatalyst.
